root: ^Detective, I came back to my house and I found this note. Whoever took my daughter is threatening me to not get a detective involved.
^Let me see... I'll need to take this for evidence. In the meantime, you should lay low.

s: ^Tell me what you know about the missing women?
^Do you know where they were seen last?

A: ^There are two missing women that I know of. Cassandra, my daughter, went missing two weeks ago. Then another woman, I don’t know who she is, showed up dead this morning.
B: ^My daughter was last seen at the bar.
^Okay, seems like I’m going to have to go to the streets to get more information. Remember to stay low and I'll see you soon when I have more information.
